1.content:
As summer break was approaching your parents are preparing for a long vacation.
The last day of school arrives and your parents are packed and ready to go.
"You will be staying with your Aunt" your mother states.

A few hours later your Aunt arrives and loads your suitcase into her car.
You get in the back and drive off to her place.
1.title: Welcome to your new home

11.content:
When you arrive, your Aunt bring your suitcase in and you follow.

"Alright! I'll let you get unpacked, follow me" She stated

You follow her to a spare bedroom, clean and pretty empty. A dresser and a small bed with white walls.
11.title: New home

111.content:
You shrug and start unloading the suitcase into the dresser.

You sit on the bed for a bit, and eventually head downstairs.

Your Aunt sees you and says "All set? Feel free to watch tv or explore the house"
111.title: This is the room

1112.content:
You decide to explore the house, first you head upstairs and look at your Aunt's room and the huge bathroom.
Next you head downstairs, then down to the basement.

There are a lot of boxes, shelves and old furniture. In the back you notice a crib frame and a little matress, beside it is a box for a highchair that looks untouched.
You look through some boxes and eventually hear your Aunt call you for supper.
1112.title: Explore the house

11121.content:
You sit and eat supper together, then head to the living room to watch tv.

After watching a diaper commercial the image of the crib reminds you of the one you saw downstairs.

Do you ...
11121.title: Supper time

111211.content:
You keep thinking about it, and ask "I was wondering, why is there a crib downstairs?"
Your Aunt gives you a smile, "Oh, I was thinking about having a baby a long time ago, but I never did" she replied

She paused for a few minutes.
Blushing you ask "I... was wondering if we could put it in my room"

Her eye brows raised and she froze for a few seconds. "Sure, if you want anything from the basement let me know"

She gets up and heads to the basement. You watch your Aunt carry the frame and mattress into your room.
She takes the other bed out and assembles the crib. She adds the mattress and bumpers, then heads back downstairs.
Your Aunt comes back into the room attaching a mobile to the top and a baby monitor the the side.
"There!" She states.
"Alright hop in" she orders
111211.title: Ask her about it

1112111.content:
You try to climb in, but your Aunt lifts you into the crib.
She tucks you in with a soft blue blanket and lifts the side of the crib.
You hear a click as it reached the top, realising you are locked in you ask
"How do I get out?"

Your Aunt smiles and points at the monitor. "That's what the monitor is for, just call for me when you wake up!" She states.

She turns on the mobile and the soft lullaby tunes before dimming the lights.
"Sweet Dreams" she said softly and left the room.

You quickly fall asleep.
You wake up...
1112111.title: Tucked in the crib

11121111.content:
You wake up and suddenly realise your thumb is in your mouth.
You sit up and notice your thumb is wet from the drool.

You hear footsteps coming towards the room.
You ...
11121111.title: Sucking your thumb

choices: Your Aunt gives you a bottle
111211111.content:
You decide to stick your thumb back in your mouth.

Your Aunt opens the door and sees you sitting up while sucking your thumb.
"Oh you're awake" she states

She walks over to you and takes your thumb out of your mouth.
"Don't do that! If you want, I can probably find you a pacifier" she says
Your Aunt unlocked the side of the crib and lowered it to the floor.
She lifts you out and checks your bottom.
"Still dry, good boy" she cooed

You blush and stick your thumb back in your mouth.
Your Aunt leaves the room for a few minutes and comes back holding a pacifier.
As she pulls your thumb out, she slips the pacifier in your mouth.
"There you go" she says.

You blush and suck on your pacifier.
111211111.title: Suck on your thumb again

1112111113.content:
You take the pacifier out of your mouth and say "Auntie, can I wear a diaper?"

Your Aunt raises her eyebrows at the blunt request. She smiles and replies "Sure, I'll go see what I can find"
You watch her exit the room and put the pacifier back in your mouth.

Your Aunt comes back holding a pull-up and a pampers diaper.

"Which one do you want?" she asks
1112111113.title: You ask for a diaper

11121111131.content:
You point at the Pampers diaper and your Aunt quickly undresses you.
She lifts you by the ankles and slides the diaper under you.
A quick sprinkle of baby powder, then she tapes up the diaper and sits you up.
"There you go!" She says.
"But I think you'll need something to wear.."
She continues

You nod still sucking on your pacifier.
When she leaves the room you feel the diaper and instantly smell the baby powder.

Your Aunt comes back holding...
11121111131.title: Pampers diaper

choices: A bowl of baby food and a bib
111211111311.content:
Your Aunt comes back holding a blue onesie and pops your head through the collar.
She quickly slides each arm into the sleeves and pushes in all of the crotch snaps.
She clips a string to your collar and ties the end around your pacifier.

She leads you to the bathroom and stands you in front of a tall mirror.
"See how cute you look, just like a 3 year old" she states

You see the bulge of the diaper and the onesie fits you surprisingly well.
You nod and she leads you to your room.
She sets up a playpen, leads you inside and then locks you in.

She tosses in some soft blocks and places a few stuffed toys around you.
"I'm going to make breakfast, have fun with your toys" She states
You suck on your pacifier and play with the toys for a while.
Your Aunt comes back holding...
111211111311.title: A blue onesie

111211111313.content:
Your aunt comes back holding a pink frilly dress and says "sorry sweetie this is all I could find since I always wanted a baby girl I only ended up buying clothes for girls I hope this is okay"

You look at the dress and think about it for a minute you decided to.....
111211111313.title: A pink frilly dress

112.content:
You notice an empty room in blue, with wallpaper and padded corners.

"What's this room?" You say as you point.

"Oh, I had planned to have a baby a while ago. So I set up a nursery, but I never did... The crib and changing table are still downstairs." She explained.

She notices your curiousity,
"Would you like to stay in this room?" She asks.

You turn bright red and try to avoid eye contact. "Uhmm.. yes please" you reply.

She surprises you with a large hug.
"It's ok, you don't need to be embarrassed. I can bring up the crib and changing table, would you like that?" She asks softly.

You nod and follow her downstairs.
After a few trips the changing table and the crib are up in thr room.

You watch as she sets the crib and places the matress and bumpers.

"Ill get the mobile and the baby monitor" she stated.
She left the room for a few minutes and when she came back, set up the mobile and monitor.

"All set! Go ahead and get unpacked" She says.
112.title: A boy's nursery

choices: Ask to be treated like a baby
Ask to be treated like a toddler
1122.content:
You bring you're stuff into the room and drop it.

"Auntie, I was wondering?" You start

She walks up to you,
"What on your mind? Don't be shy" she asks.
1122.title: Talk for a while
